HPI 8184 Subaru Legacy 1993 Rally of New Zealand Winner C. McRae/D. Ringer

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8184/8184.html

First WRC win for Colin McRae
First WRC win for Subaru
Only WRC win for Subaru Legacy

I bought this to replace my IXO KBI023 that came with the 555 livery from IXO (no decals). Believe it or not, I paid less for the HPI than I did the IXO.

For the 1993 WRC season, the Subaru team debuted its now distinctive blue and yellow color scheme, along with a new title sponsor, State Express 555. It was also McRae's first complete year of WRC competition. McRae took the first win for Subaru, at the eighth event of the season, Rally New Zealand, the last outing for the Group A Subaru Legacy rally cars that debuted in 1990.
